title: Live Briefing: Pentagon bolsters Middle East presence with additional aircraft, destroyers
content: U.S. ballistic missile defense destroyers, fighter squadron and tanker aircraft, and B-52 long-range strike bombers are expected to arrive in coming months, the Pentagon said.
summary: U.S. ballistic missile defense destroyers, fighter squadron and tanker aircraft, and B-52 long-range strike bombers are expected to arrive in coming months, the Pentagon said.

title: With northern Gaza in crisis, 15 aid groups call for withholding arms transfers
Polio vaccinations to resume in Gaza City, UNICEF says
Israel strikes Beirut area; U.N. warns conditions in northern Gaza ‘apocalyptic’
content: The entire population of northern Gaza is “at imminent risk of dying from disease, famine and violence,” leaders of 15 U.N. agencies and other humanitarian organizations said Friday.
summary: The entire population of northern Gaza is “at imminent risk of dying from disease, famine and violence,” leaders of 15 U.N. agencies and other humanitarian organizations said Friday.

title: How a Trump win would threaten abortion access around the world
content: A policy known by its critics as the “global gag rule” affects who has access to safe abortions in countries that rely on U.S.-funded programs.
summary: A policy known by its critics as the “global gag rule” affects who has access to safe abortions in countries that rely on U.S.-funded programs.

title: A commander swapped sides in Sudan’s civil war. His community paid in blood.
content: Victims say the Rapid Support Forces have carried out a spree of killing, sexual assault and looting after Abu Aqla Keikel’s defection to the Sudanese military.
summary: Victims say the Rapid Support Forces have carried out a spree of killing, sexual assault and looting after Abu Aqla Keikel’s defection to the Sudanese military.

title: Israel strikes Beirut area in Lebanon for first time in days
Spain’s floods have killed more than 200. Why have they been so deadly?
content: Climate change helps explains why the storms and floods were so extreme. But questions have emerged about whether communication failures contributed to the toll.
summary: Climate change helps explains why the storms and floods were so extreme. But questions have emerged about whether communication failures contributed to the toll.

title: Export controls failed to keep cutting-edge AI chips from China’s Huawei
content: A Chinese cryto billionaire is in the spotlight as export control evasion creates a furor.

title: Army criminal investigators scrutinize key U.S. general
content: Gen. Michael “Erik” Kurilla has been one of the Biden administration’s key emissaries to Israel and other Middle Eastern partners since the Gaza war began.
summary: Gen. Michael “Erik” Kurilla has been one of the Biden administration’s key emissaries to Israel and other Middle Eastern partners since the Gaza war began.

title: Polio vaccinations to resume in Gaza City, UNICEF says
Iran plans to respond to Israeli attack, state media reports
Kim Jong Un has sent North Korean troops to Russia. What’s in it for him?
content: The cash-strapped North Korean leader has sent some 10,000 troops to help in Russia’s war against Ukraine. Moscow could be giving him money and nuclear know-how.
summary: The cash-strapped North Korean leader has sent some 10,000 troops to help in Russia’s war against Ukraine. Moscow could be giving him money and nuclear know-how.

title: As U.S. elections loom, Ukrainian officials are ready for Trump
content: Amid the sense that the status quo isn’t working, officials privately admit they are ready for a whole new approach by the U.S. administration.
summary: Amid the sense that the status quo isn’t working, officials privately admit they are ready for a whole new approach by the U.S. administration.

title: More than 30 killed in Israeli attacks on central Gaza, medics say
Google fined $20 decillion — more than world’s total wealth — by Russian court
content: The $20,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000 fine is a response to a lawsuit by Russian channels blocked on YouTube and is largely symbolic.
summary: The $20,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000 fine is a response to a lawsuit by Russian channels blocked on YouTube and is largely symbolic.

title: As smuggling rings made billions from migrants, the U.S. was sidelined
content: Migrant-smuggling has become a top income stream for criminal groups in Latin America but for years the U.S. government did little to dismantle these networks.
summary: Migrant-smuggling has become a top income stream for criminal groups in Latin America but for years the U.S. government did little to dismantle these networks.

title: Israel has damaged or destroyed nearly a quarter of buildings in Lebanon’s south

The world beyond the election: The China problem
content: No matter who wins the election, competition between the U.S. and China will continue. Still, there are major differences between Harris and Trump’s likely approaches.
summary: No matter who wins the election, competition between the U.S. and China will continue. Still, there are major differences between Harris and Trump’s likely approaches.

title: IDF hits north Gaza’s last functioning hospital, officials say; U.S. envoys visit Israel
content: Israel attacked Kamal Adwan Hospital, Gaza authorities said. White House officials Amos Hochstein and Brett McGurk are in Israel to meet with top leaders.
summary: Israel attacked Kamal Adwan Hospital, Gaza authorities said. White House officials Amos Hochstein and Brett McGurk are in Israel to meet with top leaders.

title: On Baalbek’s edges, the displaced watch strikes rain down on their city
content: Fleeing the Lebanese city of Baalbek ahead of Israeli airstrikes, thousands find shelter — but not necessarily peace of mind — in Deir al-Ahmar.
summary: Fleeing the Lebanese city of Baalbek ahead of Israeli airstrikes, thousands find shelter — but not necessarily peace of mind — in Deir al-Ahmar.

title: North Korea tests new ICBM as its troops appear set to join Ukraine war
content: U.S. officials condemned Pyongyang’s launch of a powerful new ballistic missile and called on China to rein in North Korea’s cooperation with Russia.

title: Israel has damaged or destroyed nearly a quarter of buildings in Lebanon’s south
content: Almost 6,000 structures have been affected in border villages, including at least nine religious sites demolished in controlled explosions, a Post analysis found.
summary: Almost 6,000 structures have been affected in border villages, including at least nine religious sites demolished in controlled explosions, a Post analysis found.

title: U.S. diplomacy over Lebanon, Gaza sees little apparent progress
Canada prepares for U.S. election that ‘keeps people up at night’
content: Canada is dispatching top officials across the United States to stave off policies that could harm its interests if Trump returns to office.
summary: Canada is dispatching top officials across the United States to stave off policies that could harm its interests if Trump returns to office.

title: U.K. settles novel legal case over girl’s death from air pollution
content: The British government settled for an undisclosed amount with the mother of a 9-year-old girl who was the first to have “air pollution” on her death certificate.
summary: The British government settled for an undisclosed amount with the mother of a 9-year-old girl who was the first to have “air pollution” on her death certificate.

title: Spain’s deadly flooding killed 159. These photos show the aftermath.
content: More than 150 people were killed in unprecedented floods in the Valencia region of Spain.
summary: More than 150 people were killed in unprecedented floods in the Valencia region of Spain.

title: China built a $50 billion military stronghold in the South China Sea
content: See how China has spent tens of billions of dollars turning farm fields and seaports into military complexes on Hainan and remote outposts in the South China Sea.
summary: See how China has spent tens of billions of dollars turning farm fields and seaports into military complexes on Hainan and remote outposts in the South China Sea.

title: Typhoon Kong-rey makes landfall in Taiwan with high winds, heavy rain
content: The storm, said to be the largest typhoon to hit Taiwan in 30 years, caused damage even before making landfall.

title: Israel attacks north Gaza hospital amid growing concern over humanitarian conditions
China resists mounting pressure to do more on climate change
content: China is defying pressure to set ambitious climate targets early and to help poor nations cope with the ravages of a warming world.
